title: Calories in a Tootsie Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in tootsie roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per piece for quick tracking.
assumptions: Standard small Tootsie Roll candy (≈11 g), chocolate-flavored chewy caramel, no wrappers or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, batch, and manufacturer; values based on average. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One standard Tootsie Roll contains about 50 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 50 calories per standard small Tootsie Roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: About 10 g carbs, including 7 g sugars, with no fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Roll have fat or protein?
faqs.a: 1 g total fat (0.5 g saturated) and 0.5 g protein.
Yes, only about 10 mg sodium per piece.

faqs.q: How do mini Tootsie Rolls compare in calories?
faqs.a: A mini is roughly half, around 25 calories.
